article_title: New EHR leads transition to value-based care, Saint Francis Healthcare execs say
article_text:
When the leadership at Roper St. Francis Healthcare System decided to spend millions to implement a new enterprise EMR system, they didn't do it in a vacuum. Instead, they created a multi-department team -- including revenue cycle -- to make sure that the benefits the new EMR aligned with the 657-bed system’s goal of transitioning to value-based care.

Three RSF leaders discuss this process in the following presentation. Carol Martin, director of quality informatics; Diane Story, director of revenue cycle improvement; and Value Benefits Project Lead Patricia Newcomb reveal how they worked collaboratively with other team members, and highlight key revenue cycle requirements.

Advance to the next slide to begin the presentation.
